@zou3519 , the weight vector should also be Variable and on GPU. The criterion should also be on GPU.
The following code will run without error.

import torch
from torch.autograd import Variable
import torch.nn as nn

x = Variable(torch.randn(2, 2).cuda(), requires_grad=True)
t = Variable(torch.LongTensor([0, 1]).cuda(), requires_grad=False)
weight = torch.randn(2).cuda()
m = nn.CrossEntropyLoss(weight=weight).cuda()
m(x, t)

The following code will run without error.
```
import torch
from torch.autograd import Variable
import torch.nn as nn

x = Variable(torch.randn(2, 2).cuda(), requires_grad=True)
t = Variable(torch.LongTensor([0, 1]).cuda(), requires_grad=False)
weight = torch.randn(2).cuda()
m = nn.CrossEntropyLoss(weight=weight).cuda()
m(x, t)
